attributes.action: direct those in charge of the BBC to act in a more responsible way with regard to the waste of compulsory licence fee revenues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They could start by capping the presently outrageous salaries paid to feed the cult of the show business celebrity and encouraging those with the talent and ambition to do the same jobs just as well for a fraction of the cost to us. They might then address the doubtful nature of a large proportion of the corporations output, which could be described as anti-social rather than serving any constructive public interest.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
